title: Bloomberg Markets: Paolini's Bullish Short-Term Call
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Paolini's Bullish Short-Term Call
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Luca Paolini Chief Strategist Pictet Asset Management Discussing his global market view, seeing another 15-20% upside on stocks until the end of the cycle.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
